name: Sumo Paint Image
summary: Learn about .SUMO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When saving an image, users can select to store a file on the Sumo Paint server or to the local hard drive. To store the file on the server, users must register an online Sumo Paint account.

NOTE: Sumo Paint is accessed online through the Snap Group's Sumo Paint website. It runs as a Flash application within a Web browser that has the Flash Player plugin. Sumo Paint Pro, the commercial version of Sumo Paint, includes a local copy of Sumo Paint, which can be used offline.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
